Package org.descripter.js.api

Emulates the key features of the JavaScript language.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Value
    Emulates late-evaluations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Cases
    Represents a cache of cases emulating the case clauses of JavaScript switch statements.
    Context<S,T,W extends Context<S,T,?>>
    A base class for representing various related contexts in JavaScript.
    Core
    Facilitates with the core features of a JavaScript engine.
    For<W extends Script<?>>
    An abstract class of Script Contexts to emulate the for-in statements in JavaScript.
    Function<W extends Script<?>>
    An abstract class of Script Contexts to emulate function declaration in JavaScript.
    Functor<W extends Script<?>>
    Emulates JavaScript function definitions.
    Global<W extends Core>
    Emulates the global contexts of JavaScript.
    Key
    Emulates the object properties of JavaScript.
    Objective<W extends Objective<?>>
    An abstract base class to represent JavaScript objective contexts.
    Script<W extends Script<?>>
    Emulates script contexts of JavaScript codes.
    Script.MyFor
    An abstract base class of For without generic types.
    Script.MyFunction
    An abstract base class of Function without generic types.
    Script.MyFunctor
    An abstract base class of Functor without generic types.
    Script.MyScript
    An abstract base class for Script contexts without generic types.
    Var
    Emulates JavaScript variables.
    With<W extends Script<?>>
    Emulates JavaScript with statements.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    Thrown
    Wraps values to emulate JavaScript throwables.

Package org.descripter.js.api Description

Emulates the key features of the JavaScript language.
